DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to elucidate the influence of anti-hepatitis B virus therapy on safety and survival of HCC patient after transcatheter arterial chemoembolization.
DOC.brief_title: Synergistic Treatment for Hepatocellular Carcinoma (HCC) Using Transcatheter Arterial Chemoembolization (TACE) With Anti-hepatitis B Virus (Anti-HBV) Therapy
